page.title: 03MUSLIMS AND THEIR RELIGION
page.content: I am a Muslim and my Religion is Islam;Islam means Obedience and Woeship of Allah(God).Igo to the Mosque,where children come to read the Holy Book,The Quran,and men come to pray fife times a day,or they pray at home or at work.Women and children pray at home.Chidren are taught to pray at about the age of 10 or 11,they start reading the Quran at about 7 or 8.The Quran was received by our last Prophet,His name was Muhammed(Peace be upen Him).He was the last Prophet to teach Muslims the right way of following Allah(God).The Prophet used to lead the prayers fife times a day in Mecca,where the Ka Ba stands. The Ka Ba is the Mosque which we face when we pray.A Muslim,at least once in his life,must go on a pilgrimage to Mecca.
